description:
Keep your phone charged from the departure gate to the arrival gate. The Flip 36’s internal capacity of 10,050mAh and 2.1A output is enough to charge most phones three times, taking a bit of the sting out of long travel days.

  • Works with your favourite USB powered devices: smartphone 3 charges, POV camera 5 recharges, headlamp 5-10 recharges, tablet one full charge
  • 4 LED charge status indicator lets you know how much juice you have left
  • Pass-through charging lets you charge your device while the Flip 24 is being charged
  • Charge time for your Flip 36 is about 5 Hours from a USB port
  • Integrated USB plug flips out, meaning you don’t need any extra cables to charge your Flip
  • Input: USB type-A Male, 5V, up to 2.1A (10.5W max), output: USB A Female, 5V, up to 2.1A (10.5W max)
  • Lithium nickel manganese cobalt oxide offer lower energy density, but longer lives and inherent safety
  • During storage you can keep your Flip 24 plugged into a power source, or you need to fully charge your Flip 12 every 3-6 months and store in a cool, dry place
name: Goal Zero Flip 36 Charger
